媢字的基本解释

媢
mào
嫉妒：“帝疑以位相媢，不之信。”

媢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mào］
［《廣韻》莫報切，去号，明。］
［《廣韻》武道切，上晧，明。］
［《廣韻》莫沃切，入沃，明。］
［《廣韻》彌二切，去至，明。］
嫉妒。

媢字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媢； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页267第22
【廣韻】莫到切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】莫報切，?音冒。忌嫉也。【大學】媢嫉以惡之。【書·秦誓】作冒。【王充·論衡】妒夫媢婦。一曰怒也，不相視也。【史記·五宗世家】憲王病甚，王后以妒媢不常侍病。　又【集韻】武道切，音旄。蜜二切，音寐。謨沐切，音萺。又【正韻】莫佩切，音妹。蜜北切，音墨。義?同。

媢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
媢字的起名意思

暂无。

envious
Basic explanation of words
envious
mào
Jealousy: "The emperor's suspicion differs in position, but he does not believe it."
envious
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mào］
["Guang Yun" don't report to cut, go to the number, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" martial arts cut, Shanghao, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" Mowoqie, enter Wo, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" two cuts, go to, Ming. ]
Jealous.
envious
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媢; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 267 22
[Guang Yun] Don’t report to cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Don’t report to cut,? Don't be jealous. [University] Women are jealous of evil. 【Book·Qin Oath】Pretends. 【Wang Chong·Lunheng】Jealous husband and woman. One said that he was angry, not looking at each other. 【Historical Records·Five Family Family】The king of Xian was very sick, and the queen was not always sick with jealousy.　[Jiyun] Martial arts cut, sound awkward. Two cut honey, sound sound. Mo Muqie, Yinying. [Zhengyun] Mo Peiqie, Yinmei. Mibei cut, Yinmo. Righteous? Same.
envious
